languages.text: "Я отвечаю за безопасность и порядок на борту корабля: патрули, охрану, поиск и наказание нарушителей. Также мои блюстители следят, чтобы экипаж повиновался приказам и выполнял свои обязанности. Как говорят в моей семье, сегодня слуга допустил мысль о непослушании, а завтра готовит бунт".

"I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."
languages.original_text: "Я отвечаю за безопасность и порядок на борту корабля: патрули, охрану, поиск и наказание нарушителей. Также мои блюстители следят, чтобы экипаж повиновался приказам и выполнял свои обязанности. Как говорят в моей семье, сегодня слуга допустил мысль о непослушании, а завтра готовит бунт".

traits.locale_text: "I am responsible for safety and order aboard the ship. Guards, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers,,. Also, my enforcers make sure that the crew obey orders and carry out their duties. As they say in my family, a servant showing disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

"I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

languages.text: « Je suis chargée de la sécurité et du maintien de l'ordre sur le vaisseau. Gardes, patrouilles, débusquer et punir les fauteurs de troubles... Mes prévôts veillent également à ce que l'équipage suive toutes les consignes à la lettre et s'acquitte correctement de ses tâches. Comme on dit dans ma famille, un serviteur qui désobéit aujourd'hui fomentera une révolte demain. »
languages.original_text: "I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis chargée de la sécurité et du maintien de l'ordre sur le vaisseau. Gardes, patrouilles, débusquer et punir les fauteurs de troubles... Mes prévôts veillent également à ce que l'équipage suive toutes les consignes à la lettre et s'acquitte correctement de ses tâches. Comme on dit dans ma famille, un serviteur qui désobéit aujourd'hui fomentera une révolte demain. »

languages.text: «Tengo la responsabilidad de mantener la seguridad y el orden a bordo de la nave. Guardias, patrullas, encontrar y castigar a los alborotadores... Además, mi personal de seguridad se asegura de que la tripulación sigue todas las directivas y cumple con sus deberes correctamente. Como decimos en mi familia, un sirviente desobediente hoy organizará una rebelión mañana».
languages.original_text: "I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo la responsabilidad de mantener la seguridad y el orden a bordo de la nave. Guardias, patrullas, encontrar y castigar a los alborotadores... Además, mi personal de seguridad se asegura de que la tripulación sigue todas las directivas y cumple con sus deberes correctamente. Como decimos en mi familia, un sirviente desobediente hoy organizará una rebelión mañana».

languages.text: “我负责维护船上的安全与秩序，站岗巡逻，查处寻衅滋事分子，对他们进行惩处……此外，我手下的执法者要负责确保所有船员都服从命令，正确执行任务。就像我们家族的人常说的那样，那些仆人今天敢心怀不满，明天就敢聚众暴乱。”
languages.original_text: "I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: “我负责维护船上的安全与秩序，站岗巡逻，查处寻衅滋事分子，对他们进行惩处……此外，我手下的执法者要负责确保所有船员都服从命令，正确执行任务。就像我们家族的人常说的那样，那些仆人今天敢心怀不满，明天就敢聚众暴乱。”

languages.text: 「私には船内の安全と秩序を守る責任があります。警備、パトロール、問題児の発見と処罰…。さらに、私のエンフォーサー達は、乗組員がすべての指示に従い、適切に任務を遂行するように仕向けます。私の一族には、こんな言葉があります。『今日不服従を示す使用人は、明日暴動を起こす 』と」
languages.original_text: "I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: 「私には船内の安全と秩序を守る責任があります。警備、パトロール、問題児の発見と処罰…。さらに、私のエンフォーサー達は、乗組員がすべての指示に従い、適切に任務を遂行するように仕向けます。私の一族には、こんな言葉があります。『今日不服従を示す使用人は、明日暴動を起こす 』と」

languages.text: "Ich bin verantwortlich dafür, die Sicherheit und Ordnung auf dem Schiff zu wahren. Wachdienst, Patrouille, Unruhestifter finden und bestrafen ... Darüber hinaus stellen meine Enforcers sicher, dass die Crew sämtliche Befehle befolgt und ihre Pflichten korrekt erfüllt. Wie es in meiner Familie heißt: Ein Diener, der heute Ungehorsam zeigt, zettelt morgen einen Aufstand an."
languages.original_text: "I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."

Wie es in meiner Familie heißt: Ein Diener, der heute Ungehorsam zeigt, zettelt morgen einen Aufstand an."

languages.text: "Gemide güvenliği ve düzeni sağlamakla sorumluyum. Muhafızlık görevleri, devriyeler, sorun çıkaranları bulup cezalandırmak... Ek olarak infazcılarım, mürettebatın tüm direktifleri uygulamasını ve vazifelerini doğru şekilde yerine getirmesini sağlar. Ailemde de dendiği gibi 'Bugün itaatsizlik gösteren bir hizmetkâr, yarın bir isyan planlar.'"
languages.original_text: "I am responsible for upholding safety and order aboard the ship. Guard duties, patrols, finding and punishing troublemakers... In addition, my enforcers ensure that the crew follow all directives and carry out their tasks properly. As they say in my family, a servant who shows disobedience today prepares a riot tomorrow."
